section.title: EVMSmartStop
section.para: EVMSmartStop invokes the SmartStop of a virtual machine identified by vmId. SmartStop enforces all policies containing the vm_stop event assigned to the virtual machine and its host.

listitem.para: Input: The GUID of a VM.
Output: VmdbwsSupport..VmCmdResult. Each VmdbwsSupport..VmCmdResult contains the result of the SmartStop and the reason for the result.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMSmartStop usage:
